value.title: Self-driving cars could only prevent a third of U.S. crashes: study
value.excerpt: (Reuters) - Self-driving cars, long touted by developers as a way to eliminate road deaths, could likely only prevent a third of all U.S. road crashes, according to a study released on Thursday.
